attributes.action: pass a law to make it illegal for politicians to make blatently false and fraudulent promises about what they intend to do if they win a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
OK. circumstance change, the condition of our economy,the world economy, or the world politics, may be drastically different shortly after an election, but politicians must be held responsible for their blatant lies before an election.
If it is clear that politicians have made promises they have no intention of implementing, then they, and their party must be held responsible with heavy fines, and even having their individual seats put up for re-election.
And this must be implemented by the judiciary, and not the politicians themselves.
